ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of SUSAN O'SULLIVAN of Ottawa, Ontario, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of Justice, to be known as the Federal Ombudsman for Victims of Crime, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years.
